Mihajlović odgovara Mrkonjiću: Objasni kako je u tvom mandatu gradjen auto-put od gline i blata

05 Nov 2019, 11:55

Članica Predsedništva Srpske napredne stranke (SNS) Zorana Mihajlović izjavila je danas da pred svaki početak izborne kampanje Socijalistička partije Srbije (SPS) počne u medijima da se preispituje o vladajućoj koaliciji i  da koketira sa opozcijom kako bi došla do glasača koji ne podržavaju Vladu Srbije u kojoj sede."Nisam iznenadjena što počasni predsednik SPS-a Milutin Mrkonjić kritikuje Srpsku naprednu stranku, sa kojom su u koaliciji, nije to prvi put. Čini se da SPS želi svoju političku budućnost da gradi na koketiranju sa opozicijom i kritikovanju SNS-a, kako bi došli do glasača koji ne podržavaju Vladu Srbije, u kojoj sede. Izbori će pokazati šta o tome misle gradjani i gradjanke Srbije", navela je Mihajlović u pisnoj izjavi povodom navoda Mrkonjića da je "hajka" na SPS stereotip početka izborne kampanje SNS.Ono što bi po njoj Mrkonjić trebalo da radi jeste da objasni tužiocima kako je u njegovom mandatu gradjen auto-put od gline i blata, zbog čega je još pre dve godine Ministarstvo gradjevinarstva, saobraćaja i infrastrukture podnelo krivičnu prijavu.Članica Predsedništva SNS-a dodala je da bi, umesto što u medijima kritikuje SNS, mnogo bolje bilo da počasni predsednik SPS-a konačno tužiocima objasni kako se auto-put koji je plaćen 75 miliona evra raspao pre nego što je uopšte pušten u saobraćaj.Milutin Mrkonjić je za "Danas" ocenio da najavljeno preispitivanje saradnje SNS sa koalicionim partnerima, pre svega sa SPS, "predstavlja stereotipan početak izborne kampanje za parlamentarne izbore"."Svima je jasno da je Socijalistička partija Srbije lojalan i korektan partner SNS i da ne radi bilo šta iza ledja naprednjacima. Verujem zato da neće biti nikakvih promena unutar vladajuće koalicije ne samo nakon sednice Predsedništva SNS već i nakon izbora. Smatram da je bolje da Dačić i Vučić zajedno vode državu", ocenio je Mrkonjić za "Danas".

Mihajlovic replies to Mrkonjic: Explain how a clay and mud highway was built in your tenure

05 Nov 2019, 11:55

Serbian Progressive Party (SNS) Presidency member Zorana Mihajlovic said today that before each start of the Socialist Party of Serbia (SPS) election campaign, she would start scrutinizing the ruling coalition in the media and flirt with the opposition to reach voters who do not support the Serbian government in "I'm not surprised that the SPS Honorary President Milutin Mrkonjic criticizes the Serbian Progressive Party, with which they are in coalition, this is not the first time. It seems that the SPS wants to build its political future on flirting with the opposition and criticizing the SNS. The elections will show what the citizens of Serbia think about it, "Mihajlovic said in a written statement regarding Mrkonjic's allegation that" the chase "on the SPS was the stereotype of the start of the SNS election campaign. What Mrkonjic should do is explain to prosecutors how a clay and mud highway was built in his tenure, which is why Two years ago, the Ministry of Construction, Transport and Infrastructure filed a criminal complaint. A SNS Presidency member added that instead of criticizing the SNS in the media, it would be much better for the SPS honorary president to finally explain to prosecutors how the highway The paid 75 million euros fell before it was even put into circulation. Milutin Mrkonjic said for Danas that the announced review of SNS cooperation with coalition partners, above all with the SPS, "represents a stereotypical start to the election campaign for parliamentary elections." it is clear that the Socialist Party of Serbia is a loyal and correct partner of the SNS and is not doing anything behind the backs of the progressives. I believe that there will be no change within the ruling coalition not only after the SNS Presidency session but also after the elections. I think it is better for Dacic and Vucic to lead the country together, "Mrkonjic told Danas.
